mapper.select: select role_id, role_name, description from sys_role
select username, lastname,realname from sys_role_user sru LEFT JOIN sys_user su on sru.user_name=su.username where sru.role_id=#{value}

select srr.resource_id || ',' || sdsd.struct_name as resource_name from sys_role_resource srr join sys_data_struct_define sdsd on srr.resource_id = sdsd.struct_code where 1=1 and srr.resource_type = 'menu_struct' and srr.role_id = #{roleId}

select dsn.node_code, dsn.parent_node_code, dsn.node_name, 'menu' node_type, case when IFNULL(srr.menu_code, 'false') = dsn.node_code then 'true' else 'false' end as is_checked, (select case when count(*) = 0 then 'Y' else 'N' end from sys_data_struct_node subdsn where subdsn.struct_code = dsn.struct_code and subdsn.parent_node_code = dsn.node_code) is_leaf_node from sys_data_struct_node dsn left join sys_role_menu_relation srr on ( srr.role_id = #{roleId} and dsn.node_code = srr.menu_code ) where dsn.struct_code = #{structCode} and dsn.enabled_flag = 'Y' ORDER BY dsn.display_order

select so.operation_code node_code, so.function_code parent_node_code, so.operation_name node_name, 'operation' node_type, case when nvl(srr.resource_id, 'false') = so.operation_code then 'true' else 'false' end as is_checked from sys_data_struct_node_attribute dsna, sys_operation so LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource srr on ( srr.role_id = #{roleId} and srr.resource_type = 'operation' and so.operation_code = srr.resource_id ) where dsna.struct_code = #{structCode} and dsna.node_code = #{nodeCode} and dsna.attribute_code = 'function_code' and dsna.attribute_value = so.function_code order by so.operation_code
